content: Mother of Flamlings one of the optional Yaoguai Chief boss fights Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. You'll need to summon her with Fire Ore to make her appear, then you're in for a fight against her and her Flamlings.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mother_of_Flamlings.md', within the main section titled 'Mother of Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
Mother of Flamlings one of the optional Yaoguai Chief boss fights Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. You'll need to summon her with Fire Ore to make her appear, then you're in for a fight against her and her Flamlings.
